dialogue.htmlContent:
The wooden doors of the Gambling Den's front entrance are propped open, allowing you to easily make your way forwards into the establishment. As you enter, you find yourself standing in a very large entrance hall. A sign hanging from the ceiling in front of you reads 'Welcome to the Gambling Den!', and from somewhere further within the building, you hear the distinctive sounds of laughter, conversation, and then of a slot machine dispensing coins to a lucky winner.

Although there only a few people loitering around in this entrance hall, the constant drone of chatter coming from up ahead lets you know that this place must be quite popular. As you start to walk forwards, intent on exploring the establishment, a voice suddenly calls out from your right-hand side, [axel.speech(Hello there! I haven't seen you here before!)]

Turning towards the source of the voice, you see a tall, muscular alligator-boy grinning at you. The scales covering his body are all a brilliant white, and as he comes to a halt in front of you, his pair of bright blue eyes lock onto yours, and he continues, [axel.speech(I'm [axel.name], the owner of this place, and I like to say hello to every fresh face I see!)]

[pc.speech(I'm [pc.name],)] you reply, returning the alligator-boy's greeting as he happily reaches out to shake your hand.

[axel.speech(It's a pleasure to meet you! Now, if you're looking to have some fun, you've come to the right place. We've got dice poker straight ahead down the hall here,)] [axel.name] says, pointing one of his clawed hands forwards, before turning it to the right and continuing, [axel.speech(and the slot machines are lining the main atrium down to the right there. If you continue on down to the very end, you'll find my good friend Epona, who runs our very special 'pregnancy roulette' game! You can get all the details of that from her.)]

[pc.speech(Thanks,)] you say, [pc.speech(I'll go and check it all out.)]

[axel.speech(Oh, and, erm, we've also got a shop,)] [axel.name] says, the friendly tone of his voice shifting into one of discomfort. [axel.speech(Roxy's the one that runs it. Just be careful around her, ok?)]

[pc.speech(Ok, I'll see you around,)] you say, letting [axel.name] hurry off to one side of the hall before moving off to explore the building.

You find yourself standing in the Gambling Den's entrance hall. A sign hanging from the ceiling in front of you reads 'Welcome to the Gambling Den!', and from somewhere further within the building, you hear the distinctive sounds of laughter, conversation, and then of a slot machine dispensing coins to a lucky winner.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_axelFeminised)) To one side of the hall, you see the curvy, feminine figure of [axel.name], the owner of this establishment. The albino [axel.race] looks to be busy keeping a close watch over everyone who comes and goes. #ELSEIF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_axelSissified)) To one side of the hall, you see the slim, androgynous figure of [axel.name], the owner of this establishment. The albino [axel.race] looks to be busy keeping a close watch over everyone who comes and goes. #ELSE To one side of the hall, you see the large, muscular figure of [axel.name], the owner of this establishment. The albino [axel.race] looks to be busy keeping a close watch over everyone who comes and goes. #ENDIF

As you enter the gambling den, you once again spot the large, muscular figure of [axel.name] happily welcoming visitors to his establishment. Upon catching sight of you, his smile widens, and he hurries over to thank you for what you've done, [axel.speech([pc.Name]! I can't thank you enough for helping me sort out that whole Vengar situation! If I'm honest, I didn't really expect you to be able to do it, but I'm finally free of him! Well... Almost free, that is...)]

Asking Axel what he means by that, and also how he found out that Vengar had been dealt with so quickly, you listen as the albino alligator-boy explains, [axel.speech(Well, I had a visit from the Enforcers, you see. Apparently, they confiscated all of of Vengar's wealth as 'evidence', so they couldn't give me any of my money back. Instead, they gave me a different form of compensation...)]

At that moment, you notice the familiar figure of Roxy swiftly walking over from her shop, and, not caring at all about interrupting your conversation, she shouts out, [roxy.speech('Ey! Lizard! I's got another question 'bout Vengar!)]

[axel.speech(Please, I already asked you not to call me that,)] Axel replies, turning to one side to face the rat-girl, [axel.speech(and can't you see that I'm talking to [pc.name]? You could at least say 'excuse me', you know...)]

[roxy.speech(I ain't got time fer yer shit,)] Roxy states, before pausing for a moment to stick a cigarette in her mouth and light it. Blowing out a large cloud of smoke, she continues, [roxy.speech(So, you's said I could do anythin' I wanted with Vengar, right? It ain't gonna be a problem fer me later down the line if I get 'im addicted ta me cunt or transform 'im a bit, will it?)]

[axel.speech(Look, I don't want you abusing people you're responsible for, even if he is your ex and he wronged you in the pas-)] Axel starts, but Roxy furrows her eyebrows and interrupts him yet again.

[roxy.speech(Don't you's be gettin' involved in me private life, lizard! That fuckin' twat wants ta cheat on me, an' thinks he's off the hook cos he set me up workin' here? He can fuckin' think again!)] she shouts, before puffing on her cigarette and repeating her initial question, [roxy.speech(So can I get 'im addicted to me cunt an' transform 'im a bit or not? I don't want ya gettin' all pissy later on just cos I didn't ask or some shit like that.)]

Some of the nearby patrons of the gambling den start to turn their heads at the scene unfolding before them, and, wanting to avoid this negative publicity, Axel gives in to Roxy's demands, [axel.speech(Yes, yes, I already said you can treat him like he's yours, so long as you prevent him from causing any damage to my business. Just... don't go too far, ok?)]

Letting a wicked grin settle on her face, Roxy turns her back on the two of you and marches back off to her shop, calling over her shoulder and addressing you as she goes, [roxy.speech(Ya want a taste o' my cunt, all yer gotta do is drop by later! See ya!)]

With an exasperated sigh, Axel turns back towards you and reveals what by now was obvious, [axel.speech(Yes, that 'compensation' the Enforcers gave me was a Slaver License and the recently-enslaved Vengar, as well as another of his thugs; some nasty piece of work called 'Murk'. I have neither the time nor inclination for dealing with those two, so I agreed to give Vengar to Roxy, while Murk is being watched over by Epona.)]

You ask Axel if he's considered selling the two of them, seeing as he doesn't have any real interest in owning slaves. Letting his shoulders slump, and releasing another heavy sigh, the alligator-boy reveals, [axel.speech(The Enforcers have places selling restrictions on the two of them. They said they might need evidence from them later, and don't want to be chasing paper trails all over the city, so I'm stuck with them. Anyway, enough of my troubles, I need to get you a reward!)]

#IF(pc.hasCompanions()) Asking you to wait for a moment, Axel hurries off into his office to fetch this reward, leaving you and [npc.name] to speculate between yourselves as to what it could be. #ELSE Asking you to wait for a moment, Axel hurries off into his office to fetch this reward, leaving you to speculate as to what it could be. #ENDIF After just a couple of minutes, he returns holding a small bag, and with a big smile on his face, pushes it into your [pc.hands]. [axel.speech(This is for all your trouble, and you also have my eternal thanks!)] he happily exclaims, before revealing, [axel.speech(There are fifty thousand flames in there.)]

Opening the bag, you see that it's filled with coins, and after thanking him, you wonder what to say to Axel next...

To the left-hand side of the Gambling Den's main entrance, there's a sturdy wooden door bearing a brass plaque engraved with the words '[axel.name]'s Office'. At the moment, it's securely shut and locked, so there's not really much for you to do except turn around and step away from the door...

#IF(axel.isAttractedTo(pc))

You ask [axel.name] to come and have a 'discussion' with you in [axel.her] office. [axel.She] blushes and accepts, rubbing up against you as [axel.she] leads you inside. Once in there, [npc.she] asks what it is you wanted to do to [axel.herHim]...

#ELSE

You ask [axel.name] to come and have a 'discussion' with you in [axel.her] office. [axel.She] accepts, but doesn't dsplay any sign of being attracted to you as [axel.she] leads you inside. Once in there, [npc.she] asks what it is you wanted...

#ENDIF

You ask [axel.name] to come and have a 'discussion' with you in [axel.her] office. [axel.She] accepts, rubbing up against you as [axel.she] leads you inside. Once in there, [npc.she] asks what it is you wanted of [axel.herHim]...
You tell [axel.name] that you're going to dominate [axel.herHim]. [axel.Name] moans and tells you to do whatever you want to [axel.herHim]...
You tell [axel.name] that you want [axel.herHim] to dominate you. [axel.Name] blushes and tells you that [axel.she]'ll do [axel.her] best...
You tell [lexa.name] that you're going to take [lexa.her] cage off. You do so.
You tell [lexa.name] that [lexa.she] needs to be caged. You do so.
You decide against doing anything with [lexa.name] and take your leave.
You tell Axel that you want to suck his cock. Kneeling before him, you get it out and take it into your mouth...

#IF(pc.hasPenisIgnoreDildo() && pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_PENIS, true)) You tell Axel that you want him to suck your cock. Kneeling before you, he gets it out and takes it into his mouth... #ELSE You tell Axel that you want him to perform cunnilingus on you. Kneeling before you, he gains access to your pussy and starts eating you out... #ENDIF
You tell Axel that you want to perform anilingus on him. Kneeling behind him, you gain access to his ass and start licking his asshole...
You tell Axel that you want him to perform anilingus on you. Kneeling behind you, he gains access to your ass and starts licking your asshole...
You decide against doing anything with Axel and take your leave.
You and Axel step back from one another. Still horny, he asks if you want to go further...
#IF(!game.isAnalContentEnabled()) Axel bends you over his desk and starts fucking your pussy... #ELSE Axel bends you over his desk and starts fucking your ass... #ENDIF

#IF(!game.isAnalContentEnabled()) You get Axel to sit down, then sit in his lap and guide his cock into your pussy... #ELSE You get Axel to sit down, then sit in his lap and guide his cock into your ass... #ENDIF
You lie down and get Axel to ride your cock...
You decide against going any further with Axel and take your leave.
You and Axel disentangle yourselves from one another's clutches.
You and Axel leave his office and head back out into the gambling den.
You and [lexa.name] disentangle yourselves from one another's clutches.
You and [lexa.name] leave [lexa.her] office and head back out into the gambling den.
You convince [lexa.name] that there's more pleasure to be had if [lexa.she] was attracted to both feminine and masculine people. You use your Hypno-watch to make [lexa.herHim] ambiphilic...

You ask [lexa.name] if [lexa.she] has the feminising potion which Vengar gave [lexa.herHim]. [lexa.She] replies in the affirmative, and wonders out loud if [lexa.she] should use it. [lexa.She] also expresses uncertainty about using the blue potion which would increase [lexa.her] cock size...

You convince [lexa.name] to drink the potion which Vengar gave [lexa.herHim], without taking any of the supplement.

She feminises fully into a pretty alligator-girl, while her cock shrinks down to a tiny little clit-dick.

She expresses that she doesn't feel comfortable in her current clothes anymore, and asks you for advice.

You convince [lexa.name] to drink the potion which Vengar gave [lexa.herHim], while taking half of the supplement.

She feminises fully into a pretty alligator-girl, while her cock stays the same size.

She expresses that she doesn't feel comfortable in her current clothes anymore, and asks you for advice.

You convince [lexa.name] to drink the potion which Vengar gave [lexa.herHim], while taking all of the supplement.

She feminises fully into a pretty alligator-girl, while her cock grows to the same large size it used to be.

She expresses that she doesn't feel comfortable in her current clothes anymore, and asks you for advice.
You decide against convincing [lexa.name] to drink the potion, and instead wonder if there's anything else you want from [lexa.herHim]...

You tell [lexa.name] that she should start wearing more feminine clothes, like dresses. She says that she's bought some clothing in anticipation of this moment, and asks you to wait while she gets changed.

Agreeing to wait, [lexa.name] gets changed and returns wearing a dress. You compliment her on it, making her happy.

You tell [lexa.name] that she should start wearing maid clothes. She says that she's bought some clothing in anticipation of this moment, and asks you to wait while she gets changed.

Agreeing to wait, [lexa.name] gets changed and returns wearing a maid's outfit. You compliment her on it, making her happy.

You tell [lexa.name] that she should start wearing really trashy, whorish clothing, so that everyone knows she's your little slut. She says that she's bought some clothing in anticipation of this moment, and asks you to wait while she gets changed.

Agreeing to wait, [lexa.name] gets changed and returns wearing slutty, very revealing clothing. You compliment her on it, making her happy.
You tell [lexa.name] that she should change her outfit.
You tell [lexa.name] that she should start wearing more feminine clothes, like dresses. She gets changed and returns wearing a dress. You compliment her on it, making her happy.
You tell [lexa.name] that she should start wearing a maid outfit. She gets changed and returns wearing a maid's dress. You compliment her on it, making her happy.
You tell [lexa.name] that she should start wearing really slutty clothing. She gets changed and returns wearing a very revealing, whorish clothing. You compliment her on it, making her happy.
You decide against having [lexa.name] change her outfit, and instead wonder if there's anything else you want from [lexa.herHim]...

Deciding that you'd like to talk to [axel.name], you approach the albino [axel.race] and call out a greeting to [axel.herHim].

[axel.speech(Ah, hello, [pc.name]!)] [axel.she] responds, turning to face you. Flashing you a toothy grin, [axel.she] asks, [axel.speech(What can I do for you?)]

[pc.speech(So what's the story with Roxy?)] you ask, [pc.speech(She seems to be a little rough with her customers.)]

[axel.speech(Yeah, she's nothing but trouble.)] [axel.name] sighs, [axel.speech(If it were up to me, I'd have thrown her out a long time ago. Seeing as she's Vengar's ex, I've got no choice but to leave her alo-)]

[axel.name] suddenly stops talking mid-sentence, and upon realising that he's said more than he meant to, starts to panic and stutter, [axel.speech(I-I mean, she's no trouble at all, ok? I never really meant to say that I want to throw her out! I was just joking, you understand?)]

[pc.speech(What's the matter?)] you ask, worried about [axel.name]'s sudden shift in tone, [pc.speech(And who's Vengar?)]

[axel.name] glances around nervously, before leaning in towards you and lowering his voice, [axel.speech(Y-You mean you're not working for him?)]

[pc.speech(I don't even know who he is,)] you reply.

[axel.name] lets out a big sigh of relief, [axel.speech(Thank goodness. I've been getting careless recently. I really shouldn't have mentioned Vengar... Just forget what I said, ok?)]

#IF(pc.hasQuest(QUEST_LINE_SIDE_VENGAR))

[pc.speech(Can you tell me anything else about Roxy?)] you ask, hoping to get some more information from [axel.name] about her.

[axel.speech(Well, other than that she's Vengar's ex-girlfriend, I don't really know too much about her,)] the [axel.race] replies, [axel.speech(That is, other than the obvious fact that she's extremely rude. She treats me like dirt whenever I try talking to her, so I've never been able to find out anything about her.)]

#IF(pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_SIDE_VENGAR))

[pc.speech(And you can't get rid of her even though the situation with Vengar is all sorted out now?)] you ask.

[axel.speech(That's right. The two of them forced me to sign a contract letting her work here indefinitely, so there's nothing that can legally be done to get rid of her now...)]

#ELSE

[pc.speech(And you can't get rid of her due to Vengar?)] you ask.

[axel.speech(That's right, but even if Vengar was no longer a problem, I'd still be stuck with her. The two of them forced me to sign a contract letting her work here indefinitely, so there's nothing that can legally be done to get rid of her now...)]

#ENDIF

With your questions answered, you wonder what to ask [axel.name] about next...

#ELSE

[pc.speech(Can you tell me anything else about Roxy?)] you ask, hoping to get some more information from [axel.name] about her.

[axel.speech(Well, that's complicated,)] [axel.name] replies, nervously shuffling his feet. [axel.speech(I mean, I don't know anything about her really, other than she's a pleasure to be around.)]

You can tell that [axel.name] is lying, and you surmise that it's because he doesn't know you well enough to be openly talking to you about Roxy. Perhaps if you were to try and get some more information regarding this 'Vengar' person first, you'd be able to earn his trust and then ask him about Roxy again?

#ENDIF

Picking up on the name which [axel.name] inadvertently let slip, you inquire as to who 'Vengar' is, and why Roxy being his ex makes it so that [axel.name] has to put up with her.

[axel.speech(You mean you don't know who Vengar is?)] [axel.name] asks, before nervously glancing around to make sure that nobody's eavesdropping on your conversation. Convinced that it's safe to talk, he steps a little closer towards you and continues, [axel.speech(I guess you'll just end up going around asking questions elsewhere if I don't explain it to you, so I'll tell you who Vengar is. He likes to keep a low profile, so please don't mention to anyone that it was me who told you about him, ok?)]

You can tell from the tone of [axel.name]'s voice that he's scared to be talking about this 'Vengar' character, so you quickly reassure him that any information that he shares with you will remain a secret. Put at ease by your words, the albino [axel.race] lets out a small sigh, before once again glancing around to check for eavesdroppers, and then starting to explain.

[axel.speech(Vengar's the leader of the largest and most dangerous criminal gang down here in Submission,)] he reveals, [axel.speech(He and his rat-morph followers extort all of the business owners down here, and those who refuse to pay protection money either have their premises vandalised, or even worse, are sometimes beaten up or even go missing. Thanks to how successful my business has been, Vengar's taken a personal interest in me, and keeps on demanding more and more protection money every month. It's gotten almost to the point where I'm going to have to shut the Gambling Den down...)]

[pc.speech(Can't the Enforcers do anything?)] you ask.

[axel.speech(I've already tried talking to them about it, but they say they don't have the manpower to guard my business, and while Vengar is a wanted criminal, he's proving impossible to track down and arrest,)] [axel.name] sighs, [axel.speech(So there's nothing anyone can do to help, and that's about the whole story...)]

It sounds as though [axel.name] doesn't want to talk about this any more, but if you wanted to get involved, you suppose you could always offer to help track down Vengar and put a stop to his extortion of Submission's business owners...

Deciding that you want to help [axel.name], you offer, #IF(pc.isCowardly()) [pc.speech(I could try to find a way to get Vengar off your back, so long as I don't have to fight anyone or anything... Where exactly is he?)] #ELSEIF(pc.isBrave() && !pc.isShy()) [pc.speech(Don't worry, I'll deal with Vengar, even if it means having to fight his entire gang! Just tell me where he is!)] #ELSE [pc.speech(If you tell me where he is, I'll deal with Vengar for you.)] #ENDIF

[axel.speech(Really? You'd be willing to help me out like that?)] [axel.name] asks in disbelief, [axel.speech(I wouldn't want you to risk yourself on my behalf, but if you're really serious, then you might be able to find Vengar in his gang's main hideout; they call it the 'Rat Warrens', and it's down in the South-Western tunnels here in Submission. I don't know what the password to get is, but I guess if you say you're there regarding the money I owe them, they should let you in.)]

Telling [axel.name] that you'll find Vengar and bring him to justice, you get ready to set off, but before you go, the albino [axel.race] says that he has some more advice for you.

[axel.speech(You could always try to get the Enforcers to help,)] he suggests, [axel.speech(They told me that they were unable to make a move on his hideout, but maybe you could convince them to give you some backup? Oh, and I should also warn you; if you're thinking of fighting Vengar, then you need to be on the lookout for his two rat-girl bodyguards. I've never seen them myself, but Vengar said that if I ever refused to pay him, then I'd be given to them as a plaything...)]

[axel.name] shudders as he recalls a disturbing memory, before shaking his head and giving you a toothy smile. [axel.speech(I really appreciate your offer of help, but please don't feel obliged to put yourself in harm's way solely on my account. If you do decide to confront Vengar, just please stay safe, ok?)]

Telling [axel.name] that you'll be careful, you wonder if you should do as he suggests and ask Claire for some help from the Enforcers. Then again, you could always try to deal with Vengar by yourself...

[style.italicsBad(Innoxia's note: This quest is in a very rough state in this version! I advise waiting for the next update before playing through the rest of it!)]

#IF(pc.hasQuest(QUEST_LINE_SIDE_VENGAR))

Curious to find out about any recent events at the Gambling Den, you ask [axel.name] how [axel.she] is and how [axel.her] business is going.

#IF(pc.isQuestCompleted(QUEST_LINE_SIDE_VENGAR))

[axel.speech(I'm doing well, thank you,)] [axel.name] responds, smiling happily at you as [npc.she] continues, [axel.speech(Now that I'm not having to pay Vengar every month, I'm finally starting to turn a profit on this place. I can't thank you enough for your help in resolving that whole business...)]

Before you can respond to this, the [axel.race] smiles at you and asks, [axel.speech(So, is there anything else I can help you with?)]

#ELSE

[axel.speech(I'm doing well, thank you,)] [axel.name] responds, before letting out a sigh as he continues, [axel.speech(But I don't know how much longer I can keep this place open. Business is going well, but Vengar's demanding more and more protection money. I've already told him that he's going to run this place into the ground, but he just doesn't care.)]

Before you can respond to this, the alligator-boy shakes his head and smiles at you, before apologising, [axel.speech(Sorry, I don't mean to be pessimistic, and I don't want to offload my worries onto you. Is there anything else I can help you with?)]

#ENDIF #ELSE

Curious to find out about any recent events at the Gambling Den, you ask [axel.name] how he is and how his business is going.

[axel.speech(I'm doing well, thank you,)] [axel.name] responds, before letting out a weary sigh as he continues, [axel.speech(But if I'm being honest with you, I'm just about ready to give up on this whole business...)]

Before you can respond to this, the alligator-boy shakes his head and smiles at you, [axel.speech(Sorry, I don't mean to be pessimistic, and I don't want to offload my worries onto you. Please ignore what I just said; everything's fine with me, thanks for asking.)]

#ENDIF

You tell Axel about Vengar's demand, of having to go to the Rat Warrens and submit in person. Axel is flustered, but agrees to go if you think that's the best way tor resolve this whole mess. Asks if you want to go now or later.

You tell Axel that the two of you should go and see Vengar now. You go with him to the Rat Warrens, and are escorted towards Vengar's hall. On the way, Shadow slips in behind you and whispers into your ear that Vengar has prepared a potion that will sissify Axel.

You arrive at the hall, where Vengar demands Axel strip and kneel to show his submission. Axel does it with a brave face. Vengar tells him he's impressed, and to have a final drink together before never having to see one another again.
You stop Axel from drinking the potion-laced rum. Vengar laughs and lets you go.

You say nothing and let Axel drink the potion-laced rum. He transforms before your eyes into a far slimmer and shorter androgynous version of himself. Vengar advances on Axel and says that [axel.she] should have a new name, 'Lexa'.

Lexa agrees and lets out a little moan as Vengar traces his fingers over [lexa.her] chest. Vengar produces a light pink chastity cage and clips it on Lexa's cock, saying [lexa.she] won't need to be doing any dominant fucking any more.

You stop Vegnar from going any further. He laughs and lets the two of you go. Gives you the key to Lexa's cage.

On the way out, Silence gives a pair of potions to Lexa; one pink, the other smaller and blue. Shadow says the pink one will make [lexa.herHim] even more feminine, while the blue will retain or even grow [lexa.her] cock size if drunk immediately after.

You return to the gambling den. [lexa.Name] tells you that [lexa.she] has a reward for all of your help...

Vengar suggests that either you or he should fuck Lexa to really put [lexa.herHim] in [lexa.her] place...

#IF(!axel.isAttractedTo(pc))

Lexa expresses [lexa.her] unwillingness to have sex with someone as feminine as you. Vengar says you'll just have to watch him fuck Lexa then...

#ENDIF

You stop Vengar from going any further. He laughs and lets the two of you go. Gives you the key to Lexa's cage.

On the way out, Silence gives a pair of potions to Lexa; one pink, the other smaller and blue. Shadow says the pink one will make [lexa.herHim] even more feminine, while the blue will retain or even grow [lexa.her] cock size if drunk immediately after.

You return to the gambling den. [lexa.Name] tells you that [lexa.she] has a reward for all of your help...
You agree, and say that you should be the one to fuck [lexa.herHim]. [lexa.Name] eagerly submits to you...
You agree, and say that you should be the one who [lexa.name] submits to. [lexa.Name] eagerly kneels and prepares to eat you out...
You agree, and say that you should be the one who [lexa.name] submits to. [lexa.Name] eagerly kneels and prepares to give you a blowjob...
You agree, and say that Vengar should be the one who [lexa.name] submits to. [lexa.Name] eagerly submits and gets fucked by the rat-boy...
You agree, and say that Vengar should be the one who [lexa.name] submits to. [lexa.Name] eagerly kneels and prepares to give the rat-boy a blowjob...
Having shown [lexa.her] submission in such a humiliating manner, [lexa.name] hugs tightly to you as the two of you prepare to leave the Rat Warrens...

The two of you head back out of the Rat Warrens. Vengar gives you the key to Lexa's cage.

On the way out, Silence gives a pair of potions to Lexa; one pink, the other smaller and blue. Shadow says the pink one will make [lexa.herHim] even more feminine, while the blue will retain or even grow [lexa.her] cock size if drunk immediately after.

You return to the gambling den. [lexa.Name] tells you that [lexa.she] has a reward for all of your help...

[lexa.name] gives you [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames, and reveals that [lexa.she] overhead Shadow, but thought that it sounded fun to have an opportunity to have a different perspective.

#IF(axel.isAttractedTo(pc)) Asks you if you'll come back and see [lexa.herHim] again for maybe some more 'rewards'. For now, though, [lexa.she] asks if you can go and report all of this to Claire. #ELSE As a final favour, [lexa.name] asks if you'd go and report all of this to Claire. #ENDIF

You tell [lexa.name] that you'll visit [lexa.herHim] another time, before doing as she asks and setting off to see Claire.

You get to the Enforcer post and meet Claire. She reveals that Vengar is no longer wanted, after bribing all the right people and turning over a large amount of his lieutenants in what amounts to such a significant betrayal that any hopes of his gang reforming and completely dead in the water.

She also reveals that Shadow and Silence were let off, and have sought out a new line of work up in Dominion's slaver alley. Other than that, there's not much more to report, and you leave.

The wide, spacious atrium of the Gambling Den is filled with the laughter and chatter of at least a hundred customers. Looking around, you see all manner of races, not just the usual alligator and rat-morphs which make up most of Submission's population.

Lining the walls of this vast hall are countless slot machines, in front of which sit the vast majority of the people in this area. Down the middle of the hall, numerous tables and chairs have been set out, and it's here that the rest of the establishment's patrons are drinking and playing casual gambling games with one another.

Although most of the slot machines are occupied, there are still quite a few which have been left vacant, and you could easily walk up to one and have a go, if you so desired.

In one corner of the Gambling Den's central atrium, several pairs of glass doors have been propped open to grant easy access to a huge, adjoining hall, which is dedicated solely to the immensely popular game of dice poker. At least fifty tables are scattered around the hall's floor, and although each one only seats two players, there are far more than a hundred people present, as around most of the tables, large crowds of onlookers have gathered around to watch ongoing games.

The hall is split into three sections, with each one decorated in copper, silver, or gold. The copper section is by far the largest, and from the nearby signs, you gather that these are the tables at which the betting is lowest. The silver section is roughly half the size of the copper one, and is a place where gamblers are willing to bet considerable sums of money on the outcome of their games. Finally, the gold section is the smallest of all three, and is reserved for players willing to bet huge sums of money.

Although the vast majority of tables are occupied, you can spot at least one in each section which has just one player sitting at it. If you wanted to, you could walk up to one of these tables and sit down for a game, or you could walk up to one of the nearby signs to read about the rules of dice poker.

Deciding to read the rules of dice poker before starting a game, you walk up to the nearest informative sign, and briefly scan over it...

[axel.name]'s Rules For Dice Poker
1. Both players place the buy-in amount to start a game. This is [style.moneyFormat(500, span)] for [style.colourCopper(copper)] tables, [style.moneyFormat(2500, span)] for [style.colourSilver(silver)], and [style.moneyFormat(10000, span)] for [style.colourGold(gold)].
2. Both players roll five dice each.
3. Players can choose to increase the bet (referred to as a 'raise'), or leave the bet at the buy-in amount (referred to as a 'call').
4. After betting is done, each player selects as many of their dice as they want to re-roll.
5. The players re-roll their chosen dice.
6. The ranking of each player's dice is compared to find the winner, who then takes all of the money in the pot.

Results ranking (from winning to losing)
1. Five of a kind: Five dice of the same value. (e.g. 33333)
2. Four of a kind: Four dice of the same value. (e.g. 55551)
3. High straight: Consecutive numbers starting at two. (e.g. 23456)
4. Full house: Two dice of the same value, plus three dice of a different, same value. (e.g. 22666)
5. Three of a kind: Three dice of the same value. (e.g. 44415)
6. Low straight: Consecutive numbers starting at one. (e.g. 12345)
7. Two pair: Two dice of the same value, plus two dice of a different, same value. (e.g. 55331)
8. Pair: Two dice of the same value. (e.g. 22415)
9. Runt: All dice of different values. (e.g. 13456)

If both players have the same ranking, the total value of the dice that make up their rank are compared. For example:
Player A: 33661
Player B: 22115
Although both players have 'Two pair', player A wins, as the total of their ranking dice is 18 (3+3+6+6), compared to player B's 6 (2+2+1+1).

If both players have the same ranking, and the same value, the game is a draw, and the money in the pot is returned to each player's hand.

Set into the far right corner of the Gambling Den's main atrium, there's a wide, open archway, which leads into a small room. The interior of this room is concealed from public view by means of a dark blue canvas privacy screen, which bears a stylised black silhouette of a horse-boy sporting a massive erection. Beneath this icon, you read the words 'Pregnancy Roulette: Male breeder room'.

Seeing as there's nobody around to stop you, you decide to step into the room and take a closer look at what lies beyond. Moving forwards, you peek around the side of the canvas screen, and find yourself looking upon a small, wooden-floored room. The only furnishings in this area are a couple of basic wooden tables and benches, which have been pushed up against the left and right-hand walls. Set into the far side of the room, you see a large mirror and solitary door, and a few [unit.lSizes] to the left of those, at about waist-height, there's a round opening in the wall.

You immediately recognise the padded opening, and as you take a look at it, you see the familiar leather bench positioned right on the other side. Remembering the last time you participated in 'pregnancy roulette' you know that the 'mother' lies on that bench, with her rear half exposed to the room in order to be bred.

With the room currently deserted, there's not much to do in here, so you turn around and decide to go elsewhere...

Stepping into the room to take a closer look, you see that this opening in the wall has been padded on all sides, and, looking through it, you see a leather bench positioned right on the other side. You realise that this must be where the target of 'pregnancy roulette' lies, with her rear half exposed to the room, ready to be fucked by the breeders.

With the room currently deserted, there's not much to do in here, so you turn around and decide to go elsewhere...

Set into the far left corner of the Gambling Den's main atrium, there's a wide, open archway, which leads into a small room. The interior of this room is concealed from public view by means of a dark pink canvas privacy screen, which bears a stylised white silhouette of a horse-girl futa sporting a massive erection. Beneath this icon, you read the words 'Pregnancy Roulette: Futa breeder room'.

Seeing as there's nobody around to stop you, you decide to step into the room and take a closer look at what lies beyond. Moving forwards, you peek around the side of the canvas screen, and find yourself looking upon a small, wooden-floored room. The only furnishings in this area are a couple of elegant wooden tables and padded sofas, which have been pushed up against the left and right-hand walls. Set into the far side of the room, you see a large mirror and solitary door, and a few [unit.lSizes] to the left of those, at about waist-height, there's a round opening in the wall.
